ABOUT ME

Hi there! I am  Narendra Mannan
I am an International Student from Bangalore, India. A sophomore majoring in Computer Science (B.S.) at California State University Fresno (Fresno State)
My passion for technology started at an early age and I was always fascinated with programming growing up. When I got my Android phone, I flashed it with a custom ROM by CynogenMod and realized the true potential of programming and creating things myself.
I am currently working as a Supplemental Instructor (SI) Leader for CSci 40 (Introduction to Programming and Problem Solving) and Administrative Student Leader for the International Office.
